name: esa_landcover_v207
title: ESA Land Cover (version 2.0.7)
description: ESA land cover class data product defined based on the UN Land Cover Classification System (LCCS).
details: The ESA land cover column names in export file are modified for readability and ease of use. The full name of each class can be found from land cover map user guide: http://maps.elie.ucl.ac.be/CCI/viewer/download.php

extract_types_info.categorical: categories based on the UN Land Cover Classification System (LCCS). Warning: provides 23 category columns for each year selected
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Defourny, P. (2017): ESA Land Cover Climate Change Initiative (Land_Cover_cci): Land Cover Maps, v2.0.7. Centre for Environmental Data Analysis, 7/2017
